metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31650 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In SoX 14.4.2, there is a floating-point exception in lsx_aiffstartwrite in aiff.c in libsox.a.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31650` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsox-fmt-all - 14.4.2+git20190427-3ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-alsa - 14.4.2+git20190427-3ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-ao - 14.4.2+git20190427-3ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-base - 14.4.2+git20190427-3ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-mp3 - 14.4.2+git20190427-3ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-oss - 14.4.2+git20190427-3ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-pulse - 14.4.2+git20190427-3ubuntu0.1
libsox3 - 14.4.2+git20190427-3ubuntu0.1
sox - 14.4.2+git20190427-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sox package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '14.4.2+git20190427-3ubuntu0.1').
